calma is a noun meaning "lamp" in Quenya: File:Calma.gifCalma is also the name in Quenya of the third letter of the Tengwar alphabet.  It is the third letter of the first grade or Tyellë
Note: which contains "voiceless stops" and it is the first letter in the third series of consonants.  For written Quenya or Sindarin
The names of the letters: the third series is used for the k-series
column4: the Calmatéma and Calma represents K or "hard" C.  In Westron the third series is used for a variety of consonantal sounds and this letter represents CH as in "church".  The Westron name for this letter is Ché.See Westron Tengwar

calma is a noun meaning "lamp" in Quenya: The word derives from the Primitive Quendian Sundocarme KAL.
